description: Try our easy to follow Nice Cream Bowls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bowl,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Mother's Day,Strawberry,High fibre,Wheat free,Apple,Dairy free
name: Nice Cream Bowls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 100Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Lay apple on tray in a single layer. Bake for 30 minutes, turning over halfway, or until pale golden and edges have curled.
Add banana to a blender and blitz to a paste. Add raspberries and blend until thoroughly combined.
Scoop or pipe raspberry mixture into each serving bowl. Top with apple, strawberries, goji berries, cacao nibs, cacao almonds, coconut flakes and figs. Serve.
